SELECT BSNS_CODE , SCHEDULE_SN , SCHEDULE_DT , ST_HOUR , END_HOUR , SUBJECT , CONTENT , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID
FROM BSNS_SCHEDULE WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND SUBSTR(SCHEDULE_DT,1,4) = #{toYear} AND SUBSTR(SCHEDULE_DT,6,2) = #{toMonth}
SELECT BSNS_CODE , SCHEDULE_SN , SCHEDULE_DT , ST_HOUR , END_HOUR , SUBJECT , CONTENT , REG_DT , REG_ID , MOD_DT , MOD_ID FROM BSNS_SCHEDULE WHERE 1=1 AND SCHEDULE_SN = #{scheduleSn}

SELECT BSNS_CODE , SCHEDULE_SN , SCHEDULE_DT , ST_HOUR , END_HOUR , SUBJECT FROM BSNS_SCHEDULE WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND SCHEDULE_DT = CURDATE()
AND SCHEDULE_DT BETWEEN ADDDATE(CURDATE(), -WEEKDAY(CURDATE())) AND ADDDATE(CURDATE(), 6-WEEKDAY(CURDATE()))
AND SCHEDULE_DT BETWEEN ADDDATE(CURDATE(), 1-DAYOFMONTH(CURDATE())) AND LAST_DAY(CURDATE())
ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DT ,SCHEDULE_SN

SELECT COUNT(AA.BOARD_SN) FROM BSNS_BOARD AA /* 업체_게시판 */ WHERE 1=1 AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.BSNS_CODE = #{bsnsCode} AND AA.BOARD_GBN_CD = #{boardGbnCd}
AND AA.SUBJECT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND AA.CONTENT LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')
AND CONCAT(AA.SUBJECT, AA.CONTENT) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%')

SELECT AA.BSNS_CODE /* 업체_코드 */ ,AA.BOARD_SN /* 게시판_일련번호*/ ,AA.BOARD_GBN_CD /* 게시판_구분_코드 */ ,AA.SUBJECT /* 제목 */ ,AA.CONTENT /* 내용 */ ,AA.HIT_COUNT /* 조회 수 */ ,AA.REG_ID /* 등록_ID */ FROM BSNS_BOARD AA /* 업체_게시판 */ WHERE 1=1 AND AA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND AA.BSNS_CODE = #{bsnsCode} AND AA.BOARD_SN = #{boardSn}
